name: Dalbello CX 1.0 GW Jr. Ski Boots - Children
description: A ski boot for the littlest of rippers. The snug fit is also comfortable thanks to Supercomfort JR liners. A simple ratchet buckle is easy for small mitten-covered hands to lock and will stay put, run after run.Single ratchet buckle closes the boot and tightens it.Supercomfort JR liners provide warmth and comfort.Forgiving flex provide just enough support to help with the learning process.Grip-Walk soles makes walking in boots easier.
